title: Cybersecurity and economic sanctions – a new EU approach to cybersecurity threats?
arranger: Mannheimer Swartling Advokatbyrå, American Chamber of Commerce in Sweden
description: The EU is developing a strategy to prevent and respond to cyber disruptions and attacks. One of the measures considered is economic sanctions for individuals, companies and countries posing cybersecurity threats. The panel will discuss the EU proposal, the US experience, and possible sanctions.
